Sentencas: Although various additive manufacturing techniques are used intensively to mold materials for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications, 3D printing has not been applied to obtain sealants which are crucial components for SOFC stacking.
Titulo: Fused deposition modeling of glass sealants: A new approach to SOFC sealing

Sentencas: It is essential to develop different methods for molding sealing products based on glasses and glass-ceramics which are the most promising materials for SOFC stacking.
Titulo: Fused deposition modeling of glass sealants: A new approach to SOFC sealing

Sentencas: This study reveals the potential of fused deposition modeling (FDM) for the production of complex shape objects for the sealing of tubular SOFC in the example of the composition based on thermoplastic, thermoplastic elastomer, oil, and a filler (glass sealant).
Titulo: Fused deposition modeling of glass sealants: A new approach to SOFC sealing

Sentencas: The highest filler content in the mixture is 63 wt %.
Titulo: Fused deposition modeling of glass sealants: A new approach to SOFC sealing

Sentencas: Two aluminosilicate sealants of different compositions are used as the filler and the printed products are successfully applied for tubular supporting anode'sealant'steel joints.
Titulo: Fused deposition modeling of glass sealants: A new approach to SOFC sealing
